title: Placement - KIIT Deemed to be University
summary: Campus placement highlights, year-wise placement statistics, KIIT-Kareer School description, and contact details.

title: 2024 Highlights (excerpt)
text: For 2024 KIIT recorded 700+ companies visiting, 5585+ job offers and a highest package of 53 lakhs.

notes: 2020: 20 companies with CTC more than 10 lakhs
2019: 18 companies with CTC More than 10 lakhs (Adobe Systems mentioned)
2018: 14 companies with CTC More than 10 lakhs
2017: 25 companies with CTC More than 5 lakhs
2016: 12 companies with CTC More than 10 lakhs

title: KIIT-Kareer School
text: KIIT has a dedicated Career School that takes care of the holistic development of the students for Placement Training and also takes care of shaping careers post their graduation by training them for higher studies.
